complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down initialization into: tool installation, configuration, .taskmaster structure setup, developer documentation, CI setup, environment variable management, and model provider documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Project initialization involves multiple toolchains, configuration steps, documentation, and CI integration. Each step has dependencies and potential pitfalls, requiring careful sequencing and validation. Industry best practices recommend explicit separation of environment setup, documentation, and CI for maintainability and onboarding efficiency.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand deployment into: GitHub integration, build settings, environment variable management, edge function setup, CDN/caching configuration, and post-deploy smoke testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Deploying to Cloudflare Pages requires coordination between source control, build pipelines, serverless endpoints, and CDN policies. Each aspect (integration, configuration, edge functions, caching, testing) is distinct and should be validated independently for reliability and security.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose into: table creation, RLS policy definition, service role setup, admin role configuration, access audit logging, migration scripting, and schema documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database schema and security configuration are high-risk and require granular control. Best practices dictate separating table design, security policies, role management, audit logging, and migration/documentation to ensure compliance and maintainability.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Tools directory (coming soon) and future tools
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Keep as: index page creation and placeholder badge setup for each tool.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a simple UI placeholder task with minimal logic or integration. No further decomposition is needed beyond the two existing subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand to: page creation, environment variable wiring, Zoho Sign API/link integration, and manual/automated signing flow testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating an external signing service involves UI, environment management, API/link setup, and testing. Adding a dedicated integration/test subtask aligns with best practices for third-party service reliability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: axe-core CI integration, Lighthouse CI setup, custom accessibility test case authoring, color contrast automation, local test documentation, reporting, and remediation workflow.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Automated accessibility enforcement requires multiple tools, custom test authoring, reporting, and remediation. Industry standards recommend explicit separation of CI integration, test writing, and documentation for sustainable compliance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand to: serverless endpoint creation, environment variable management, Stripe session wiring, webhook handling, Supabase logging, client-side integration, redirect logic, and end-to-end test automation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Payment integration is high-complexity due to security, multi-system coordination, and error handling. Each integration point (server, client, webhook, logging, testing) should be isolated for reliability and auditability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: typecheck, lint, unit test, build, Lighthouse CI, accessibility checks, deployment, and pipeline failure notification.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Modern CI/CD pipelines are multi-stage and require explicit steps for validation, quality, and deployment. Adding notification and error handling subtasks aligns with best practices for robust delivery.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand to: Supabase logging, notification email setup, call notification entry, admin view creation, success page CTA, and support process documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Post-purchase flows span backend logging, notification, UI, and support documentation. Each should be a distinct subtask to ensure traceability and operational clarity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into: meta/Open Graph tag setup, sitemap/robots.txt generation, schema.org JSON-LD integration, and SEO validation/testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: SEO implementation involves multiple file types and validation steps. Adding a dedicated SEO validation/testing subtask ensures completeness and compliance with search engine standards.
